edu.smu.tspell.wordnet.impl.file
Class SynsetFactory

java.lang.Object
  edu.smu.tspell.wordnet.impl.file.SynsetFactory
public class SynsetFactory
extends Object

Provides a central location from which synset instances can be retrieved.

Synsets may be cached to improve performance and minimize memory usage and when a synset is requested, the cache is first checked and the cached instance will be returned if one exists. If the synset isn't found in the cache, however, it will be read from disk and possibly added to the cache.

See Also:
Reference Objects and Garbage Collection

getSynset

public Synset getSynset(SynsetPointer pointer)
                 throws WordNetException
Returns a synset that's referenced by a pointer, reading it from disk if necessary.

Parameters:
pointer - Pointer that identifies the location of the synset in the database.
Returns:
Synset that was read from the database either as a result of this call or a previous one that resulted in it being cached.
Throws:
WordNetException - An error occurred reading or parsing the synset.
